title: Introducing convolutional neural networks (ML Zero to Hero - Part 3)
excerpt: In part three of Machine Learning Zero to Hero, AI Advocate Laurence Moroney (lmoroney@) discusses convolutional neural networks and why they are so powerful in Computer vision scenarios. A convolution is a filter that passes over an image, processes it, and extracts features that show a commonality
